Design. Build. Test.

I am a software tester currently based in London. My passion has always been around problem solving, and I am always looking for something to utilise and develop my mathematical and analytical skills.

Since 2008 I have been playing the drums in a band, performing across the UK and Europe. This has led me to many amazing places with wonderful people, experiencing unique adventures. Since moving to London I have moved towards solo projects and collaberations with other musicians due to the logistics of space.

I have a strong interest in electronics and programming, a few achiements that I am proud of are:-

  • Designed and built multiple custom guitars
  • Developed my own game, combining my love for music and programming
    • Currently designing

Along with other projects and interests that can be seen on my blog
